Bash(git -C /mnt/c/Users/eldri/cdata commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add deduplication, incremental fetch, index system, and static site generator

Features:
- Deduplication via primary_keys in source configs prevents duplicate records
- Incremental fetching with ''incremental: true'' fetches only new data since last run
- Index system tracks datasets with metadata \(record counts, columns, fetch history\)
- Static site generator creates HTML pages for browsing data locally

New CLI commands:
- data index: Show dataset index
- data rebuild-index: Rebuild index from existing data  
- data site: Generate static HTML site

Also:
- Remove personal config files \(financial, news, sparql, sports\)
- Update example.yaml to showcase all features with clean examples
- Add web/ module with static site generator

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
YouTube tutorial import with video frame extraction

Major new feature: Import piano tutorials from YouTube and practice with
synchronized video frames showing hand positions.

New components:
- YouTubeImporter: Paste URL, extract audio, analyze notes, select passages
- PracticeFrameDisplay: Self-contained practice mode with audio playback
- YouTubeExtractor: yt-dlp integration for audio/video download
- VideoAnalyzer: Pitch detection from audio using pitchy library
- PitchDetector: YIN algorithm wrapper for monophonic note detection
- MicrophoneInput: Real-time audio capture for future mic-based practice
- ComparisonEngine: Note matching logic for practice feedback

Workflow:
1. Paste YouTube URL → extracts audio via yt-dlp
2. Analyzes audio for notes \(cached to avoid re-processing\)
3. Navigate video, mark start/end of passage to practice
4. Click "Practice This Passage" → extracts frames for that segment
5. Practice mode plays actual YouTube audio with synced video frames

Technical details:
- IPC bridge for file operations \(Electron security blocks file://\)
- ffmpeg for frame extraction at specific timestamps
- Frames extracted at 2fps for selected segment \(not whole video\)
- Audio blob URLs for playback in renderer process

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
